description:
Keynote is a great application for creating outstanding presentations on your Mac.

And I will teach you how to make a good presentation with iWork Keynote '09.

*In this course I use LAST version of Keynote 5.3 which is part of Apple iWork '09 Suite*

During this How To Make A Good Presentation course I will teach you the way to benefit from all Keynote features such as: Master Slides, Slide Transitions, Object Builds, Masking Images, Embedding Video, 2D and 3D charts, Formatting Tables and many others.

You will start from download and installation of Keynote application and finish with knowledge how to create fully featured presentation which you can preview in video about this iWork Keynote '09 Training.

All lessons include practical starting and completed exercises.

Ensure that you will download Exercise Files in Introduction section.

For best learning experience I strongly recommend you

</p>

  • Perform the same steps as I will do in my lessons using exercise files
  • Follow my lessons one by one without skipping
If you are new to Keynote or you are experienced user of it, take this course and become an Expert in Keynote in several hours!

Take this iWork Keynote '09 Training course now and learn how to make a good presentation
title: iWork Keynote Training
